description: Automating the deployment of AWS infrastructure using Terraform, including VPC, MongoDB setup, EC2 instance configuration, and ALB setup.

infrastructure.name: VPC Setup
infrastructure.description: Designed and deployed a VPC with public and private subnets, routing tables, and Internet gateways.
steps: Configured routing tables and Internet gateways.
Set up security groups to control traffic.

infrastructure.name: MongoDB Deployment
infrastructure.description: Deployed MongoDB in a secure network with backup mechanisms.
steps: Ensured secure network connectivity for EC2 instances.

infrastructure.name: EC2 Instance Setup
infrastructure.description: Configured EC2 instances to interact with MongoDB and handle application traffic.
steps: Launched EC2 instances with IAM roles.
Set up security groups for secure access.

infrastructure.name: Application Load Balancer (ALB) Setup
infrastructure.description: Set up ALB to distribute traffic across EC2 instances in private subnet.
steps: Set up health checks and auto-scaling.
